long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never miss a sale! Never miss out on a purchase! ROBO tracks prices and stock at your favourite online retailers, allowing you to buy the things you want, when you want, at prices you dream of.

Something's just a bit too expensive? ROBO will let you know the moment it goes on sale. Seen something amazing but your size is unavailable? ROBO will let you know the instant it's back in stock.

ROBO supports all countries and currencies. Dollars, euros, pounds, roubles, yen. It's all good!

Compatible with thousands of retailers across dozens of countries, including Amazon, Argos, eBay, John Lewis, Nike and supermarkets such as Tesco, Iceland, Morrisons, Ocado, Sainsbury's and Waitrose.

Track across all your devices, from phones to laptops. ROBO is compatible with Android devices, iOS devices and web browsers such as Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome.

Receive notifications on your Android and iOS devices, for free, the moment items go on sale or come back in stock. Simply download the companion smartphone app. Multiple devices? No problem. ROBO can notify you on up to 100 devices. (Yes - 100!)

Install ROBO today and start saving. Have any questions? We'd be delighted to hear from you. We're available at: humans@roboshop.uk
